attributes.action: make solar panels compulsory on all new build houses & to subsidise fitting of solar panels & other proven forms of energy conservation on existing housing.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Although many people would willingly take measures to create and store energy, they lack the financial ability to do so. This would encourage individuals and construction workers to build energy conservation into their plans.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "make solar panels compulsory on all new build houses & to subsidise fitting of solar panels & other proven forms of energy conservation on existing housing."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14539.asp
